data.name: Scopic
data.description:
Scopic documentaries help you travel around the globe and discover new realities. Featuring breathtaking footage and unparalleled immersive videos, Scopic’s works take the viewer to uncharted and exotic places.

Explore different perspectives that were previously unreachable. Accept this journey and discover the “forgotten” tribes and cultures photographed by Jimmy Nelson, the raw seas of the Volvo Ocean Race, and the journey of Syrian refugees, among other exclusive stories. Thanks to high-end 360° camera techniques and a creative team of experts, we give you the opportunity to access the unique VR experiences available in this innovative format.

All projects featured in the app are produced by Scopic, a VR production company located in Amsterdam. The artistic minds involved in these projects are dedicated to going beyond traditional filmmaking. We use cutting-edge technology to craft revolutionary film experiences that awe viewers with beautiful full-scope images.
